title: When does Elementalist Lux come live??

replies.body: i beleve it will come out o tuesday everyone is mad at rito about this right now

MOOOOONDAY!!!! YAY!!!!! IT"S OUT ON MONDAY!!!! OMG!!!!
https://www.facebook.com/LeagueOfLegendsDE/videos/1125380264243902/
OUR PRAYERS WERE HEARD!!! You can see the announcement in the actual facebook page
Ajhsbfmfpa.... So much waiting... I see why everyone would be mad ;-;
Yup! The German ritoers said it was coming out on the 28th! So today or tomorrow because of time zones, but let's just hope the skin is worth the wait.

At this rate we could start a
How many ways could one rephrase "When is Elementalist Lux released?"
contest.
